name: pdftk
description: Meteor wrapper for PDFTk, the PDF Toolkit. PDFTk is a simple command line tool for doing everyday things with PDF documents like: merge, split, decrypt/encrypt, fill Forms, apply a background watermark, report metrics, update PDF metadata, attach files, unpack attachments, burst into single pages, uncompress/compress, repair corrupted PDF.
author: Pascal Richier @pascalrichier
